D

Data - Class in suncertify.db
This class implements the required DBAccess interface and is used by the BookingBusinessLodgicImp class and possibly other applications to preform their database operations.
It uses two worker classes DatabaseFileAccess and the RecordLockingManager to preform its functions through their methods.
Data() - Constructor for class suncertify.db.Data
The default constructor that creates a class which implements the DBAcess interface, used to access the database.

All instances of this class share the same static DatabaseFileAccess and RecordLockingManager.
dataAccess - Variable in class suncertify.business.BookingBusinessAdapterImp
Holds an instance of DBAccess class.
DatabaseFileAccess - Class in suncertify.db
This is the worker class that does all the access and manipulation of the physical file which is the actual database.
DatabaseFileAccess(String) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
Default constructor that accepts the database path as a parameter.
All instances of this class share the same data file.
databaseLock - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
A ReentrantReadWrite Ensures that many users can read the cached Hash Map collection as long as nobody is updating it or writing to disk.
databasePath - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
The location where the database file is stored.
dataFile - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
The physical file on disk containing the Contractor records
DataFileFilter - Class in suncertify.presentation.gui
This class extends the javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter and is used by the ConfigurationPanel file chooser.
DataFileFilter() - Constructor for class suncertify.presentation.gui.DataFileFilter
The default constructor that call the constructor of its super class.
DBAccess - Interface in suncertify.db
 
dbLocationField - Variable in class suncertify.presentation.gui.BookingConfigurationPanel

DELETED_FLAG - Static variable in class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
The flag that implies deleted.
deleteRecord(long, long) - Method in class suncertify.db.Data
Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse.
deleteRecord(long) - Method in class suncertify.db.DatabaseFileAccess
This public method is used to delete a record using a long to locate the file position.
deleteRecord(long, long) - Method in interface suncertify.db.DBAccess

displayTable - Variable in class suncertify.presentation.gui.BookingDisplayPanel
 
DuplicateKeyException - Exception in suncertify.db
This Exception thrown when a created record matches the primary key (name and location fields) of an existing record exits in the database.
DuplicateKeyException() - Constructor for exception suncertify.db.DuplicateKeyException
Default constructor.
DuplicateKeyException(String) - Constructor for exception suncertify.db.DuplicateKeyException
This constructor takes the exception message.
